director.name: 菲利普·G·阿特威尔 Philip G. Atwell

introduction: 中文名称：热得冒烟英文名称：The Up In Smoke Tour资源类型：DVDRip发行时间：2005年专辑歌手：Dr. Dre, Snoop Dogg, Eminem, Ice Cube地区：美国语言：英语简介：The smoke hasn't settled yet, but there can be no doubt that this summer's "Up In Smoke" tour had the biggest fire of any touring music show. This Hip Hop All-Star show features Dr. Dre, Snoop Doggy Dogg, Eminem, Ice Cube and other special guests in a program offering many surprises, from onstage to backstage to scenes from the road shot by the artists themselves on home video cameras.主要是Dr. Dre, Snoop Doggy Dogg, Eminem, Ice Cube的表演(够了把,哈哈!!),当然还有许多客串的:Nate Dogg Warren G,TQ,Shari Watson,Xzibit .中间穿插了很多精彩搞笑的片段,片长两小时.专辑曲目：ICE CUBE Tracks:1. Hello2. You Can Do It3. N**** You Love To Hate4. We Be ClubbinEMINEM Tracks:1. Kill U2. Dead Wrong3. Under Influence4. Marshall Mathers5. Criminal6. The Real Slim ShadyDR. DRE and SNOOP DOGG Tracks:1. Next Episode2. Whats My Name?3. Ain't Nuthin' but A "G" Thang4. B***h Please (featuring Xzibit&Nate Dogg)5. Whats The Difference (featuring Eminem & Xzibit)6. Forgot About Dre (featuring Eminem)7. California Love & Gangsta Party (live performance by Snoop Dogg, track vocals by Tupac)8. F**k You (Featuring Devon the Dude9. Let Me Ride10. Still D.R.E.
